title: Why does my game crash a lot?
body: whenever I load, it takes a least a minute for the field to load and everyone else is going out already. Its kinda annoying. Any way to fix?

replies.body: A game crashing as soon as you complete loading could be due to a few reasons.  Recently, the most common reason has been a recent update with Windows 10 that's caused the Xbox game bar to interact poorly with league.  As a first step, I recommend disabling the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html).  If your issue persists, give me some more details about what you're seeing and when.  Errors or bugsplats would help too!
